name: CryptoBot
0:
”Alexa, ask Crypto Bot to tell me the current price”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Bot what is the change today?”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Bot what is the daily change?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto bot
des:
Use this skill to get the current price and change over the past 24hrs of Bitcoin and Ethereum.

Disclaimer: The data is not intended for real-time quotes as it can be delayed up to an hour.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
